title: Name Changer
body:
I want Riot put a Name Changer free but only 1 time, when i was noob in League of Legends, i put a name what isnÂ´t my liking. 
If u put a only 1 time Name Changer all persons u put a name what is liking he have the posibility of change the name 1 time for free.
Thanks Riot if u put it in the game.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: We currently don't have free name changes, but any summoner can change their name with RP or IP.  The option is available through the store, under the account section.  Hope that helps!
